name: Max_Von%27s_Bar
text:
Max Von's Bar
"Do you still know where she lives?""I know where she drinks."
 ―Gordon and Albert
Max Von's was a bar in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
History
On September 27, 2016, during a conversation with Gordon Cole in South Dakota, Albert Rosenfield implied that he knew Diane Evans was a regular client of the bar. Later that evening, Albert visited Max Von's back in Philadelphia, and he found Diane drinking at the counter. The two greeted each other, then Diane asked whether the meeting was about Cooper, which Albert didn't deny. Diane replied "no fucking way," and Albert left the bar.
